grid.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6
grid.bento_strategy: Use asymmetrical spans. Health (col-span-2 row-span-2), Professional (col-span-1 row-span-2), Spiritual (col-span-2), Hobbies (col-span-1).

buttons.primary: bg-[#FF0000] text-white hover:bg-red-700 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold text-sm px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-200
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-zinc-700 text-white hover:bg-zinc-900 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest text-sm px-8 py-4

cards.base: bg-[#111111] border border-zinc-800/50 p-6 relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-red-900/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.base: bg-[#0A0A0A] border-b-2 border-zinc-800 focus:border-[#FF0000] rounded-none px-4 py-3 text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600 focus:outline-none transition-colors

visual_enhancers.texture: Use a subtle noise overlay on the #111 cards to give them a 'cast iron' feel. opacity-5 pointer-events-none mix-blend-overlay
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-none. We rely on contrast and borders.
visual_enhancers.glass: Avoid glassmorphism. Use solid, opaque surfaces. This is a forge, not a window.

assets.icons: Lucide React. Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) for elegance against the bold typography.

setup: Configure Tailwind colors to match the palette exactly (#000000, #111111, #FF0000).
Set default border radius to 0 or 2px (rounded-sm) in tailwind.config.js.
implementation_rules: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it flat and dark.
DO NOT use rounded buttons. Keep them sharp.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA check).
Use the provided image URLs as background images for the category cards with a heavy black overlay (bg-black/60) to ensure text readability.
The 'GF' logo should be a simple SVG: <svg viewBox='0 0 100 100'><path d='...' fill='#FF0000'/></svg>. Create a geometric, sharp monogram.
For the 'Progress Bar', do not use the default rounded Shadcn component. Customize it to be rectangular.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
